messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] question that has nothing to do with unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: As far as I know, you can do that only if you re using your email interface and not the web-based board interface. Then you put that stuff in your signature .
messages.messageBody:
As far as I know, you can do that only if you're using
your email interface and not the web-based board
interface. Then you put that stuff in your
"signature". For yahoo mail the signature is under
Mail options.

Manisha

messages.subject: question that has nothing to do with unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Actually, I guess it does b/c by asking I am learning! Anyway, how do you guys get your name and blogs and quotes, etc to automatically show up at the bottom
messages.messageBody:
Actually, I guess it does b/c by asking I am learning! Anyway, how do
you guys get your name and blogs and quotes, etc to automatically show
up at the bottom of your posts? Just curious, I would love to add info
to mine... thanks!
